attributes.action: Review the government furlough scheme to include workers who started In March
attributes.additional_details:
I myself as many others are, am in a position where neither current nor previous employer say they can claim furlough for myself.

I started my job on the 2nd of March meaning the weekend is the difference between me having 80% of my wage and what I actually have which is nothing.
attributes.background: Allow people employed in March to claim furlough through their current employer.
